Mystic Charm.desc: Special Attacks used by this Pokemon reduce their targets' Speed by 1 stage.

Leaf Rush.desc: This Pokemon's Grass-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

Fiery Charge.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have their power multiplied by 1.2. Does not affect Struggle.
Fiery Charge.short: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.

Ethereal Echo.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.3.
Ethereal Echo.short: This Pokemon's sound-based attacks have 1.3x power.

Striker.desc: This Pokemon's kick-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.3.
Striker.short: This Pokemon's kick-based attacks have 1.3x power.

Acid Coat.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Poison-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2.
Acid Coat.short: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Poison type and have 1.2x power

Eclipsate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2.
Eclipsate.short: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Dark type and have 1.2x power
